name: Nilah Whipped Butter
description:
A whipped version of our body butter.

Ingredients: Raw Shea Butter, Raw Cocoa Butter, Raw Mango Butter, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Grape seed Oil, and Lemongrass.

Like Samira, Nilah combines the super powers of raw shea, cocoa, and mango butters! Among the many benefits are:

Skin softening, soothing, and moisturizing
Restoration of the skin's elasticity
Reduction of degeneration of skin cells
Contains antioxidants and polyphenols that suppress free radicals
Provides protection against UV radiation
Heals skin peeling, after tanning
Reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles
Relieves itching skin 
Heals sunburn 
Treats small skin wounds and skin cracks 
Moisturizes and softens tough rough skin 
Fights frost bite 
Aids in prevention of stretch marks during pregnancy 
Relieves insect bite irritation. 
Promotes healthy rejuvenated skin 
Effectively treats eczema and dermatitis and wrinkle


No Preservatives
No Parabens
No Synthetic Fragrances
No Dyes
No Petroleum 
No Mineral Oil

*Available in sample, 4 oz, 8 oz, and 16 oz jars.

name: Umi Butter
description:
Real Cocoa Butter--this isn't the stuff that we were raised on! This is the real deal! :)

This decadent butter will even skin tone, fade scars, improve the appearance of stretch marks over time, and improve the skin's elasticity for those growing Umi bellies!

Ingredients: Raw Cocoa Butter, Coconut Oil, and Vitamin E.

Benefits of Raw Cocoa Butter:

Raw Cocoa Butter contains antioxidants and polyphenols that suppress free radicals and soothe skin irritations.
Contains Stearic acid which reduces cholesterol.


No Preservatives
No Parabens
No Synthetic Fragrances
No Dyes
No Petroleum 
No Mineral Oil

name: Sanii Moisturizing Oil
description:
This all-in-one light and penetrating oil can be used as a bath oil, massage oil, body oil, or hair/scalp oil.

Ingredients: Apricot Kernel Oil, Avocado Oil, Safflower Oil, Cherry Kernel Oil, Peach Kernel Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Shea Oil, Vitamin E, & Essential Oils: Lemongrass, Lavender, Peppermint, Eucalyptus, Grapefruit, and Orange.

No Preservatives
No Parabens
No Synthetic Fragrances
No Dyes
No Petroleum 
No Mineral Oil

name: Aniyah CoCo Sugar Scrub
description:
An invigorating scrub that will reveal soft moisturized skin.

Ingredients: Organic Brown Sugar, Cocoa Butter, Shea Oil, Olive Oil, Grapeseed Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E and Essential Oils (Lavender, Lemongrass, Peppermint).

**This product will make the tub slippery! Please use with caution!**

After bathing, apply a generous amount of scrub to your body paying special attention to extreme dry areas (feet, heels, knees, and elbows). Using circular motions massage scrub into skin and then rinse. For best results, turn off the shower head while applying product.

No Preservatives
No Parabens
No Synthetic Fragrances
No Dyes
No Petroleum 
No Mineral Oil

name: Amina (Liquid Black Soap)
description:
Black Soap has been used by Africans for centuries as a body wash, facial soap, and shampoo.

Some of the many super powers of black soap are:

prevention and healing of acne
deep skin cleansing
ridding the scalp of dandruff
balancing oily skin
assisting with the healing of eczema
fungus removal
conditioning and softening of hair

Use in conjunction with shea butter or one of our body butters and watch how your skin will improve!

* This soap is thin; however, it will produce a rich and creamy lather. A little goes a long way!
* Available scented ( lemongrass, peppermint, lavender, eucalyptus, grapefruit, sweet orange).
